snippet: Georgia regulators are questioning DraftKings and FanDuel as they seek to determine whether the companies can operate under the state’s restrictions on gambling.
abstract: Law firm Greenberg Traurig, hired by fantasy sports company DraftKings to investigate allegations that employee won $350,000 on rival website FanDuel using insider information, finds no wrongdoing.
lead_paragraph: Georgia regulators are questioning DraftKings and FanDuel as they seek to determine whether the companies can operate under the state’s restrictions on gambling.

headline.main: Regulators in Georgia Look at Leading Fantasy Sports Sites
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Fantasy Sports; Report Finds No Misconduct
